content.question: The equation <math alttext="y equals, 2 times e to the 6 x power, minus 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math> is a particular solution to which of the following differential equations?

choices.label: <math alttext="y prime minus 6 y, minus 30, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 y prime, minus 12 y, plus 5, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="y double prime, minus 5 y prime, minus 6 y, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="y double prime, minus 2 y prime, plus y, plus 5, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y prime minus 6 y, minus 30, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
